sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUBDOMINANT, in muſic, a name given by M. Rameau to the fourth note of the tone, which of conſequence is the ſame interval from the tonic when deſcending as the dominant in rising. This denomination ariſes from the affinity which this author finds by inverſion between the minor mode of the ſubdominant and the major mode of the tonic.
